name: Payment Orchestration Sample App
description: Use Universal Checkout and Payment Orchestration to securely accept and charge credit cards on the web.

CUSTOMER_VAULT_ACCESS_CREDS_USERNAME.description: Vault Access Credentials Username. This is used to connect to the outbound route proxy.

CUSTOMER_VAULT_ACCESS_CREDS_SECRET.description: Vault Access Credentials Password. This is used to connect to the outbound route proxy.

PAYMENT_ORCH_CLIENT_ID.description: Payment Orchestration Client ID that is connected to your vault.

PAYMENT_ORCH_CLIENT_SECRET.description: Payment Orchestration Client Secret that is connected to your vault.

PAYMENT_ORCH_APP_DOMAIN.description: Payment Orchestration environment to connect to.
